If this folder is empty, you will need to download the following libraries and put them in this folder to get Geist to compile:

SDL2 : https://www.libsdl.org/
stb single-header libraries : https://github.com/nothings/stb
glm : https://github.com/g-truc/glm
GLEW : https://glew.sourceforge.net/
tinyxml2 : http://leethomason.github.io/tinyxml2/
SoLoud: https://solhsa.com/soloud/ 

The tree structure should look like this:

Geist/
    |---ThirdParty/
        |---glew/
        |---glm/
        |---SDL2/
        |---soloud/
        |---stb/
        |---tinyxml/
